sentences.en: A peony is a showy flower.
an attractive shrub with showy flowers
sentences.cn: 一丛开有鲜艳花朵的漂亮灌木

sentences.en: Black - eyed gipsy girls, hooded in showy handkerchiefs, sallied forth to tell fortunes.
sentences.cn: 黑眼睛的吉卜赛姑娘, 用华丽的手巾包着头, 突然地闯了进来替人算命.

sentences.en: He had changed his showy shoulder - strap.
sentences.cn: 他已经换去了他那条华丽的肩带.
他在引人注目的门厅里踱来踱去.

sentences.en: He scrawled his name across the bill, underlining it with a showy flourish.
sentences.cn: 他在账单上潦草地签上自己的名字，并在名字下面画了一条花体线。

sentences.en: He seems to me rather showy and bad form.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这个人有点浮华,而且派头不好.

sentences.en: Her dress was too showy for such a formal occasion.
sentences.cn: 在如此正式的场合,她的服装过分华丽了.

sentences.en: She often wears that cheap showy rhinestone bracelet.
sentences.cn: 她经常戴那个廉价艳丽的水晶手镯。

sentences.en: Since he was color blind, he favored large, showy flowers.
sentences.cn: 因为他是色盲，所以他喜爱大朵艳丽的花。

sentences.en: The clothes were very showy, very theatrical.
sentences.cn: 那些衣服很艳丽很华美，像戏装一样。

sentences.en: The showy world in which her interest lay completely absorbed her.
sentences.cn: 她所神往的这个花花世界完全把她吸引住了.

sentences.en: The whole thing was much too showy.
sentences.cn: 整个事情都未免太炫耀了.

sentences.en: The wild rose has a less showy blossom.
sentences.cn: 野玫瑰的花儿不那么艳丽.

sentences.en: They were smart but not showy.
sentences.cn: 他们衣着讲究但不惹眼。

sentences.en: This dress is too showy for you.
sentences.cn: 这件衣服对你而言是太艳丽了.

words.tran_cn: 展出；炫耀，卖弄（show的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 引人注目的，过分装饰的，太华丽的
trans.tran_en: something that is showy is very colourful, big, expensive etc, especially in a way that attracts people’s attention
